root.name: Surprise Attack
root.description: American space station has been invaded and taken hostage! Bombs have been planted and the countdown is icking... Can you find all the bombs and get rid of space terrorists in this side scrolling shooter where you can jump on an upper level or even jump over the wall and search for bombs on a background plane?! But don't give up just yet! To aid your mission you are given a special jet pack that when coming in contact with a power station will give you ability to fly, an impenetrable shield and electricity flying of in all directions. And you will need it since you can't look up, you die in one git and your weapon is not that upgreadable with only slight power increse.
